person.persName: Alexander Hamilton McGuffey (Hamilton County, Ohio, attorney and author. )

body.p: Hamilton County, Ohio, attorney. Ohio native. Son of Alexander McGuffey and Anna Holmes McGuffey. Married to Elizabeth Drake McGuffey. Father of Daniel Drake McGuffey, Charles Drake McGuffey, Harriet McGuffey, Anna McGuffey, Frederick McGuffey, Alice McGuffey Laughlin, Edward McGuffey, Helen McGuffey, and William McGuffey. Secretary and treasurer of Cincinnati College in Hamilton County, Ohio, in 1845. Attorney in Hamilton County in 1850. Attorney in Hamilton County in 1860. Employed Mary Collary and Mariah Garden as domestic servants in Hamilton County in 1860.
